verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give praise to Jesus for He is the King Let your voices ascend to His throne On the wings of the music let your hearts be raised. And in one accord make His praise known.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Singing Al – le – lu, Al – le – lu, Al – le – lu, Alleluia{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lift up His banner and greet Him with praise Our Deliverer has set us free Bow before Him, adore Him, and worship His name There is no other God like He.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Singing Al – le – lu, Al – le – lu, Al – le – lu, Alleluia{/lang-eng}
